text: Ingaba lowo uthobela uAllâh, uqubudayo okanye eme ngeenyawo (athandaze) ngeeyure zobusuku, esoyika uBomi oBuzayo, enethembalencebayeNkosiyakhe,(uyafananalowo ungakholwayo na)? Yithi: “Ingaba abo baziyo bayafana nabo bangaziyo?” Inene ngabantu bengqiqo kuphela abaya kukhumbula (bathabathe isifundo kwiiVesi ze’Kur’ân)
